title: Terry O’Malley
text:
Hi. I am an economist and data scientist working in tech.
Prior to jumping to industry, I worked as a research economist at the Central Bank of Ireland and did my PhD at University College Dublin.
I mainly work on causal inference and econometrics problems, as well as using microeconomic theory to help guide business decisions around things like selection, pricing and operations.




Young me, in good company.




Publications


Kelly, Robert, and Terry O’Malley. 2016. “The Good, the Bad and the Impaired: A Credit Risk Model of the Irish Mortgage Market.” Journal of Financial Stability 22: 1–9.


O’Malley, Terry. 2021. “The Impact of Repossession Risk on Mortgage Default.” The Journal of Finance 76 (2): 623–50.
